item.title: About Us
item.description: We are avid readers as well as Black men who created this mindfulness blog to share our favorite and most powerful resource ~ knowledge Our brand Mate means “I hear you” in Twi the Ashanti language

item.title: Books for Balanced Black Men
item.description: Osram Ne Nsoroma or ‘moon and star’ is the Adinkra symbol for harmony

item.title: Books for the Spiritual Black Man
item.description: Center yourself with these eye opening books

item.title: Books for Black youth transitioning into manhood
item.description: This is the flashlight in a dark room

item.title: Books for Black Men on Love
item.description: This article is for Black men looking to enhance their masculine psyche

item.title: Great Black Stories
item.description: Explore the mind opening stories of our brothers and sisters. From current Haitian immigration to Detroit or European invasion of West African villages, these captivating stories are a must read for all Black people. More books coming soon! 1. Things Fall Apart by Chinua Achebe 2. The Coldest Winter Ever by Sister Souljah 3. American Street by Ibi Zoboi 4. Midnight: A Ganster Love Story by Sister Souljah This is book one in a three book series.
